subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The hitting coach Mark McGwire and outfielder Skip Schumaker will try to help the Dodgers beat their old team, the Cardinals, as the N.L.C.S. begins on Friday night.
snippet: The hitting coach Mark McGwire and outfielder Skip Schumaker will try to help the Dodgers beat their old team, the Cardinals, as the N.L.C.S. begins on Friday night.
